tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE employees (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  department VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  hire_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE relationships ( 
    relation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    employee_id INT, 
    interest_id INT, 
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employees(employee_id), 
    FOREIGN KEY (interest_id) REFERENCES business_interests(interest_id)
);

CREATE TABLE conflicts_of_interest ( 
    conflict_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    employee_id INT, 
    interest_id INT, 
    description TEXT, 
    resolution TEXT, 
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employees(employee_id), 
    FOREIGN KEY (interest_id) REFERENCES business_interests(interest_id)
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    position VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE relationships (
    relationship_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id UUID REFERENCES employees(employee_id),
    related_employee_id UUID REFERENCES employees(employee_id),
    relationship_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE business_interests (
    interest_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    interest_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE conflicts_of_interest (
    conflict_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id UUID REFERENCES employees(employee_id),
    interest_id UUID REFERENCES business_interests(interest_id),
    description TEXT,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE conflicts_of_interest (
	conflict_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	employee_id INT,
	business_interest_id INT,
	relationship_type VARCHAR(50),
	start_date DATE,
	end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
	employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	first_name VARCHAR(50),
	last_name VARCHAR(50),
	email VARCHAR(50),
	designation VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE relationships (
	relationship_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	employee1_id INT,
	employee2_id INT,
	relation_type VARCHAR(50),
	start_date DATE,
	end_date DATE
);
